sentences.en: Any person who is really profoundly humane can't believe in everlasting punishment.
sentences.cn: 真正非常慈悲的人决不会相信永远的惩罚.

sentences.en: By the standards of history, his execution in 399 B.C. was singularly humane.
sentences.cn: 按照历史的标准来看, 公元前399年处死他的方式是异常人道的.

sentences.en: Companies humane management and the combination of iron discipline.
sentences.cn: 公司实行人性化管理和铁的纪律相结合.

sentences.en: In the mid-nineteenth century, Dorothea Dix began to campaign for humane treatment of the mentally ill.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪中叶，多罗西娅·迪克斯开始发起为精神病患者争取人道待遇的运动。

sentences.en: Is it humane to kill animals for food?
sentences.cn: 宰杀牲畜来吃合乎人道 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was autonomy which this humane and self - sufficient man seemed to embody.
sentences.cn: 这位既有人情味而又自负的人体现的似乎就是自主.

sentences.en: Over the years Quakers have worked for many humane causes.
sentences.cn: 多年来,贵格会从事了许多慈善事业.

sentences.en: People have found many humane methods of killing animals.
sentences.cn: 人们已经发明了很多宰杀动物的人道方法.

sentences.en: the campaign for the humane treatment of criminals
sentences.cn: 提倡人道地对待罪犯的运动

sentences.en: Those who want to take child abuse seriously today must stake out a humane child protection practice.
sentences.cn: 当前想要认真对待虐待儿童问题的人们必须明确保护儿童的人道主义行为的具体做法。

sentences.en: To follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable good.
sentences.cn: 如果能亲近有仁德的人,那将带给我们多么大的好处.

sentences.en: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.cn: 如果不亲近有仁德的人,那将带给我们多么大的害处.

sentences.en: We shall urge humane principles and use our influence to promote justice.
sentences.cn: 我们将推行人权原则并运用我们的影响去促进正义.

sentences.en: What we have done is in full accord with the humane spirit.
sentences.cn: 所做的一切都是符合人道精神的.

sentences.en: You have a broad viewpoint being more humane than personal.
sentences.cn: 你有开阔的观点,不是个人的,而是更为全体的.

sentences.en: Your attitude toward others is generous, kind and humane.
sentences.cn: 所以你对待他人是宽宏 、 亲切和仁慈的.
